item.description:
http://www.facebook.c...

An amazing night of beauty and middle eastern dance featuring new choreographies by Yale students, fabulous costumes, dancer debuts, and great music! An event not to be missed.

Location:
Off-Broadway Theater (behind Toad's)
~300 york street new haven ct

Fri. April 13th @ 9 pm
Sat. April 14th @ 7:30 pm
$4 advance/$5 at the door

For reservations & a discounted ticket price, email yalebellydance@gmail.com

PS. RSVP'ing to this group DOES NOT mean that you've made a reservation.

Featuring: Nathalie Alegre, Perin Gurel, Grace Lu, Kledia Myrtolli, Heyman Oo, Dianali Rivera, Lorraine Van Kirk, Janice White, Kristen Windmuller, Elizabeth Winograd-Cort, Rebecca Berlow, Ainsley Dicks, Kim Hayden, Linda Alila, Andrea Feuer, Gina Gonzalez-Deloa, Priscilla Guerra, Yan Wang, Natalie Castaneda, Margaret Gorlin, Neli Lazarova, Kathryn Au, Lisa Tian, Diana Tucci, Christine Boone, Mariya Absar, Clarissa Lintner, Bianca Marcolino, Lucky Ng, Naima Sykes, Betty Wolf, Jennifer Angarita, Maria Blackwood, Maria Calvache, Brittany Kelso, Jasmine Walker, Jingying Yang & Tatyana Nienow
item.name: Read my Hips! - The Yale Belly Dance Society's Second Annual Gala Performance
